title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Advertisements seen, with a total of 8 data points.
Overall Advertisements seen has increased over the Year.
Advertisements seen is gradually increasing from 2008 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2013, slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2014, and lastly roughly constant from 2014 to 2015.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
Max Advertisements seen about 47.0 was recorded at Year 2011,  2012, and 2013
Min Advertisements seen about 42.0 was recorded at Year 2008
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Advertisements seen, with a total of 8 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2008 to 2011.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately constant which exists from 2011 to 2013.
Differently, the next significant trend is moderately constant which exists from 2014 to 2015.
But, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2013 to 2014.
